item.title: personal knowledge management
item.description: ðŸŒ± seedling id:: 627824d3-e8fc-439e-983a-503ed4ff2ecf heading:: true For all of human history knowledge has been controlled and held by the elite and powerful and privileged. â€”Carrie Ben-Ysrael When we have control over how we relate to information and knowledge, that can be a radical act. When others control our relationship to information, it shapes our reality in ways we might not notice. It also affects how we construct the social identities of ourselves and others.
